mapper.sql: LTTId, Year, Place, LaCode, LaName, LTTax
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_largetraveltax where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_largetraveltax
LTTId,
Year,
Place,
LaCode,
LaName,
LTTax,
#{lttid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tbl_largetraveltax
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LTTax = #{lttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where LTTId = #{lttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_largetraveltax set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LTTax = #{lttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where LTTId = #{lttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
